docs.text:
Data standards for coral research and conservation

URI: https://w3id.org/OpenCoralTools/oct-schema

Name: oct-schema

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description OrganizationRegisterEntry A canonical organization record in the registry Record Base class for all records InventoryRecord Base class for inventory items that have URL paths Coral Represents a specific coral instance Event Represents an event in the system history Genet Represents a genetic individual Location Represents a group of items or a container within a site Organization Represents an organization Site Represents a physical site Person Represents a person (user) Species Represents a species SpeciesRegisterEntry A canonical species record in the registry

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description accessionNumber Accession number if applicable capacity Capacity of the group clonalId Clonal ID if applicable code Unique 4-character species code (e common_name Common name of the species coral_size Size of the coral coralTypeId ID of the coral type country Country where the organization is based createdAt Timestamp when the record was created createdById ID of the user who created the record deprecated_codes Previous or deprecated codes for this species description Description of the entity domain Domain name associated with the organization email Email address of the user eventTypeId ID of the event type external_references External identifiers (e genetId ID of the genet genetTypeId ID of the genet type genus The genus name groupId ID of the group/location groupIdHierarchy Hierarchy of group IDs groupTypeId ID of the group type id Unique identifier for the record imageUrl URL to the user's image internalPath Internal path structure metadata Additional metadata as a JSON string or key-value pair name Name of the entity org_id Unique identifier for the organization organizationId ID of the organization this record belongs to parentId ID of the parent entity quantity Quantity of items recordId ID of the record associated with the event recordModelType Type of the record model scientific_name Full scientific name (genus + specific_epithet) scientific_name_authorship Author and year of the species description sfId SeaFoundry ID siteId ID of the site this entity belongs to siteTypeId ID of the site type siteTypeIds List of site type IDs supported by the organization slug URL friendly identifier part speciesId ID of the species speciesIds List of species IDs supported by the organization specific_epithet The specific name (second part of the binomial name) synonyms List of synonymous scientific names updatedAt Timestamp when the record was last updated updatedById ID of the user who last updated the record url Website URL of the organization urlPath URL friendly path to this resource
